text: Arau e'ito barakatamaya kitaba yito ami aratirna karaicho, yito iyara agara sakalo kitabara satyayanakarai arau yitora dbaraa tumi makka arau iyara carai'ophale thaka manuhaka satarka karaa. Arau yisakale akhiraatara prati imana posana karae te'omloke iyara prati'o imana posana karae, arau te'omloka nija chalatara prati yatnabana
